Class Brainfuck

Represents a Brainfuck program and allows its execution.

This implementation's details are:

  1. Byte value overflow/underflow on 0-- and 255++

  2. Runtime error on out-of-bounds memory access.

  3. Unchanged cells during and after an EOF on input.

  4. An added # instruction for debugging.

Creates a new Brainfuck program ready for execution.

Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String program

The program's code. Gets minified automatically.
System.String programInput

The ASCII input of the program.
System.Int32 initialMemorySize

The initial memory size in bytes of the program. Can't exceed MaxMemorySize.
